title: Sampler, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: satin stitch and drawnwork on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Central panel with name, alphabet and numerals in cross stitch; surrounded by borders in drawnwork of geometric patterns.  Birds and lamb in each corner and a flower motif worked in satin stitch.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: satin stitch and drawnwork on plain weave. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-252.
